title: Heritage Luxury in the English Countryside with Decadent Daily Dining
description: Experience quintessential British countryside charm with a stay at De Vere Tortworth Court in the Cotswolds. A historic hotel in stunning surroundings, guests are well connected to London and the cities of Bristol, Cardiff, Gloucester and Bath. Indulge with a daily breakfast, nightly dinner, a traditional English afternoon tea and a complimentary Superior Room upgrade.

title: Heritage Luxury in the English Countryside
description: There’s no better place to discover the beauty of the English countryside than in the charming Cotswolds, where tiny historic villages are nestled amongst rolling green hills. Enjoy a romantic escape to The Manor House, a 16th century country manor in the quaint historic town of Moreton-in-Marsh, with daily breakfast and a welcome glass of prosecco included - the perfect launchpad for exploring the Cotswolds, Shakespeare’s birthplace of Stratford-Upon-Avon, Warwick and Oxford.

title: Lakeside Getaway in England's Cotswolds
description: Stay amid the rolling hills and 152 lakes of England’s Cotswolds at De Vere Cotswold Water Park. With a beautiful natural backdrop and modern design, this tranquil hideaway truly offers the best of both worlds. Perfect for foodies, enjoy daily breakfast, one afternoon tea and one three-course dinner during your stay.
offer_address: Lake 6, Spine Rd E GL7 5FP, United Kingdom

title: Cotswolds Heritage Manor Retreat near Warwick Castle and Stratford-upon-Avon
description:
Escape to the Cotswolds at the boutique Chesford Grange - A QHotel, a blissful countryside retreat awash with historic charm and contemporary glamour. Tucked away in the heart of Shakespeare’s County, with Warwickshire's canals and signature motte-and-bailey forts conveniently close by, this truly relaxing hotel invites you to embrace the nearby hidden hedged gardens, Elizabethan legacy, and medieval landmarks.

Enjoy refined comfort in a gorgeous Tudor-style manor house, where idyllic design elements, contemporary décor and historic allure are complemented by modern technology and first-class service. A host of amenities awaits to wow you, including the ultra-stylish spa and health club, heated pool, a state-of-the-art gym, and two elegant dining venues.

title: Heritage Cotswolds Manor Retreat with Holistic Spa & Celebrated Restaurant
description: Experience the quintessential charm of the English countryside at the Cowley Manor Experimental, a stately manor house nestled in the heart of the Cotswolds. This heritage manor boasts 30 acres of private parkland, complete with serene lakes and cascading waterfalls. Indulge in locally sourced, gourmet cuisine at the Restaurant, or unwind in the C-Side Spa. Explore the nearby historic market town of Cirencester, or meander through the picturesque village of Bourton-on-the-Water.
